verses.verse: וַיֵּ֥לֶךְ <WH1980> went רְחַבְעָ֖ם <WH7346> And Rehoboam שְׁכֶ֑מָה <WH7927> to Shechem כִּ֥י <WH3588> for שְׁכֶ֛ם <WH7927> for to Shechem בָּ֥אוּ <WH935> come כָל־ <WH3605> for all יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> were all Israel לְהַמְלִ֥יךְ <WH4427> to make him king אֹתֽוֹ׃ <WH853>

וַיְהִ֞י <WH1961> become כִּשְׁמֹ֨עַ <WH8085> heard יָרָבְעָ֤ם <WH3379> And it came to pass when Jeroboam בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son נְבָט֙ <WH5028> of Nebat וְה֣וּא <WH1931> he בְמִצְרַ֔יִם <WH4714> who [was] in Egypt אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> where בָּרַ֔ח <WH1272> whither he had fled מִפְּנֵ֖י <WH6440> from the presence שְׁלֹמֹ֣ה <WH8010> of Solomon הַמֶּ֑לֶךְ <WH4428> the king וַיָּ֥שָׁב <WH7725> returned יָרָבְעָ֖ם <WH3379> [it] that Jeroboam מִמִּצְרָֽיִם׃ <WH4714> out of Egypt

וַֽיִּשְׁלְחוּ֙ <WH7971> And they sent וַיִּקְרְאוּ־ <WH7121> and called ל֔וֹ וַיָּבֹ֥א <WH935> came יָרָבְעָ֖ם <WH3379> him So Jeroboam וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> and all Israel וַֽיְדַבְּר֔וּ <WH1696> and spake אֶל־ <WH413> to רְחַבְעָ֖ם <WH7346> to Rehoboam לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> saying

אָבִ֖יךָ <WH1> Thy father הִקְשָׁ֣ה <WH7185> grievous אֶת־ <WH853> עֻלֵּ֑נוּ <WH5923> made our yoke וְעַתָּ֡ה <WH6258> now הָקֵל֩ <WH7043> now therefore ease מֵעֲבֹדַ֨ת <WH5656> servitude אָבִ֜יךָ <WH1> of thy father הַקָּשָׁ֗ה <WH7186> thou somewhat the grievous וּמֵעֻלּ֧וֹ <WH5923> yoke הַכָּבֵ֛ד <WH3515> and his heavy אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which נָתַ֥ן <WH5414> that he put עָלֵ֖ינוּ <WH5921> on וְנַֽעַבְדֶֽךָּ׃ <WH5647> upon us and we will serve

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> And he said אֲלֵהֶ֗ם <WH413> to me ע֛וֹד <WH5750> again שְׁלֹ֥שֶׁת <WH7969> unto me after three יָמִ֖ים <WH3117> days וְשׁ֣וּבוּ <WH7725> unto them Come again אֵלָ֑י <WH413> about וַיֵּ֖לֶךְ <WH1980> departed הָעָֽם׃ <WH5971> And the people ס

וַיִּוָּעַ֞ץ <WH3289> took counsel הַמֶּ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> And king רְחַבְעָ֗ם <WH7346> Rehoboam אֶת־ <WH854> with הַזְּקֵנִים֙ <WH2205> with the old אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> who הָי֣וּ <WH1961> had עֹֽמְדִ֗ים <WH5975> men that had stood לִפְנֵי֙ <WH6440> before שְׁלֹמֹ֣ה <WH8010> Solomon אָבִ֔יו <WH1> his father בִּֽהְיֹת֥וֹ <WH1961> had חַ֖י <WH2416> while he yet lived לֵאמֹ֑ר <WH559> saying אֵ֚יךְ <WH349> What אַתֶּ֣ם <WH859> you נֽוֹעָצִ֔ים <WH3289> counsel give לְהָשִׁ֥יב <WH7725> ye [me] to return לָֽעָם־ <WH5971> folk הַזֶּ֖ה <WH2088> this דָּבָֽר׃ <WH1697> answer

וַיְדַבְּר֨וּ <WH1696> And they spake אֵלָ֜יו <WH413> to him לֵאמֹ֗ר <WH559> unto him saying אִם־ <WH518> If תִּֽהְיֶ֨ה <WH1961> become לְט֜וֹב <WH2896> If thou be kind לְהָעָ֤ם <WH5971> to this people הַזֶּה֙ <WH2088> to this וּרְצִיתָ֔ם <WH7521> and please וְדִבַּרְתָּ֥ <WH1696> them and speak אֲלֵהֶ֖ם <WH413> about דְּבָרִ֣ים <WH1697> words טוֹבִ֑ים <WH2896> good וְהָי֥וּ <WH1961> become לְךָ֛ עֲבָדִ֖ים <WH5650> to them they will be thy servants כָּל־ <WH3605> for הַיָּמִֽים׃ <WH3117> for ever

וַֽיַּעֲזֹ֛ב <WH5800> But he forsook אֶת־ <WH853> עֲצַ֥ת <WH6098> the counsel הַזְּקֵנִ֖ים <WH2205> which the old men אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which יְעָצֻ֑הוּ <WH3289> gave וַיִּוָּעַ֗ץ <WH3289> him and took counsel אֶת־ <WH854> with הַיְלָדִים֙ <WH3206> with the young men אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> who גָּדְל֣וּ <WH1431> that were brought up אִתּ֔וֹ <WH854> that הָעֹמְדִ֖ים <WH5975> with him that stood לְפָנָֽיו׃ <WH6440> before

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> And he said אֲלֵהֶ֗ם <WH413> to מָ֚ה <WH4100> What אַתֶּ֣ם <WH859> you נֽוֹעָצִ֔ים <WH3289> unto them What advice וְנָשִׁ֥יב <WH7725> give ye that we may return דָּבָ֖ר <WH1697> answer אֶת־ <WH853> הָעָ֣ם <WH5971> to this people הַזֶּ֑ה <WH2088> this אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> who דִּבְּר֤וּ <WH1696> which have spoken אֵלַי֙ <WH413> to me לֵאמֹ֔ר <WH559> to me saying הָקֵל֙ <WH7043> Ease מִן־ <WH4480> at הָעֹ֔ל <WH5923> somewhat the yoke אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which נָתַ֥ן <WH5414> did put אָבִ֖יךָ <WH1> that thy father עָלֵֽינוּ׃ <WH5921> him

וַיְדַבְּר֣וּ <WH1696> with him spake אִתּ֗וֹ <WH854> for הַיְלָדִים֙ <WH3206> And the young men אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> who גָּדְל֣וּ <WH1431> that were brought up אִתּוֹ֮ <WH854> to him לֵאמֹר֒ <WH559> unto him saying כֹּֽה־ <WH3541> Thus תֹאמַ֡ר <WH559> Thus shalt thou answer לָעָם֩ <WH5971> the people אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> who דִּבְּר֨וּ <WH1696> that spake אֵלֶ֜יךָ <WH413> to you לֵאמֹ֗ר <WH559> unto thee saying אָבִ֙יךָ֙ <WH1> Thy father הִכְבִּ֣יד <WH3513> heavy אֶת־ <WH853> עֻלֵּ֔נוּ <WH5923> our yoke וְאַתָּ֖ה <WH859> you הָקֵ֣ל <WH7043> but make thou [it] somewhat lighter מֵעָלֵ֑ינוּ <WH5921> and כֹּ֚ה <WH3541> Thus תֹּאמַ֣ר <WH559> for us thus shalt thou say אֲלֵהֶ֔ם <WH413> to קָֽטָנִּ֥י <WH6995> unto them My little עָבָ֖ה <WH5666> [finger] shall be thicker מִמָּתְנֵ֥י <WH4975> loins אָבִֽי׃ <WH1> than my father's

וְעַתָּ֗ה <WH6258> For whereas אָבִי֙ <WH1> my father הֶעְמִ֤יס <WH6006> put עֲלֵיכֶם֙ <WH5921> and עֹ֣ל <WH5923> yoke כָּבֵ֔ד <WH3515> a heavy וַאֲנִ֖י <WH589> I אֹסִ֣יף <WH3254> upon you I will put more עַֽל־ <WH5921> unto עֻלְּכֶ֑ם <WH5923> to your yoke אָבִ֗י <WH1> my father יִסַּ֤ר <WH3256> chastised אֶתְכֶם֙ <WH853> בַּשּׁוֹטִ֔ים <WH7752> you with whips וַאֲנִ֖י <WH589> I בָּֽעֲקְרַבִּֽים׃ <WH6137> but I [will chastise you] with scorpions ס

וַיָּבֹ֨א <WH935> came יָרָבְעָ֧ם <WH3379> So Jeroboam וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all הָעָ֛ם <WH5971> and all the people אֶל־ <WH413> to רְחַבְעָ֖ם <WH7346> to Rehoboam בַּיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> day הַשְּׁלִשִׁ֑י <WH7992> on the third כַּאֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> after דִּבֶּ֤ר <WH1696> bade הַמֶּ֙לֶךְ֙ <WH4428> as the king לֵאמֹ֔ר <WH559> saying שׁ֥וּבוּ <WH7725> Come again אֵלַ֖י <WH413> about בַּיּ֥וֹם <WH3117> day הַשְּׁלִשִֽׁי׃ <WH7992> to me on the third

וַיַּעֲנֵ֥ם <WH6030> answered הַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <WH4428> And the king קָשָׁ֑ה <WH7186> them roughly וַֽיַּעֲזֹב֙ <WH5800> forsook הַמֶּ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> and king רְחַבְעָ֔ם <WH7346> Rehoboam אֵ֖ת <WH853> עֲצַ֥ת <WH6098> the counsel הַזְּקֵנִֽים׃ <WH2205> of the old men

וַיְדַבֵּ֣ר <WH1696> And answered אֲלֵהֶ֗ם <WH413> to כַּעֲצַ֤ת <WH6098> them after the advice הַיְלָדִים֙ <WH3206> of the young men לֵאמֹ֔ר <WH559> saying אַכְבִּיד֙ <WH3513> heavy אֶֽת־ <WH853> עֻלְּכֶ֔ם <WH5923> made your yoke וַאֲנִ֖י <WH589> I אֹסִ֣יף <WH3254> but I will add עָלָ֑יו <WH5921> and אָבִ֗י <WH1> My father יִסַּ֤ר <WH3256> chastised אֶתְכֶם֙ <WH853> בַּשּׁוֹטִ֔ים <WH7752> you with whips וַאֲנִ֖י <WH589> I בָּעֲקְרַבִּֽים׃ <WH6137> but I [will chastise you] with scorpions

וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> did not שָׁמַ֥ע <WH8085> hearkened הַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <WH4428> So the king אֶל־ <WH413> to הָעָ֑ם <WH5971> not unto the people כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for הָיְתָ֤ה <WH1961> it was נְסִבָּה֙ <WH5252> for the cause מֵעִ֣ם <WH5973> from הָֽאֱלֹהִ֔ים <WH430> was of God לְמַעַן֩ <WH4616> might הָקִ֨ים <WH6965> might perform יְהוָ֜ה <WH3068> that the LORD אֶת־ <WH853> דְּבָר֗וֹ <WH1697> his word אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> which דִּבֶּר֙ <WH1696> which he spake בְּיַד֙ <WH3027> by the hand אֲחִיָּ֣הוּ <WH281> of Ahijah הַשִּֽׁלוֹנִ֔י <WH7888> the Shilonite אֶל־ <WH413> to יָרָבְעָ֖ם <WH3379> to Jeroboam בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son נְבָֽט׃ <WH5028> of Nebat

וְכָל־ <WH3605> all יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <WH3478> And when all Israel כִּ֠י <WH3588> for לֹא־ <WH3808> did not שָׁמַ֣ע <WH8085> would not hearken הַמֶּלֶךְ֮ <WH4428> ] that the king לָהֶם֒ <WH1992> like וַיָּשִׁ֣יבוּ <WH7725> answered הָעָ֣ם <WH5971> unto them the people אֶת־ <WH853> הַמֶּ֣לֶךְ ׀ <WH4428> the king לֵאמֹ֡ר <WH559> saying מַה־ <WH4100> What לָּנוּ֩ חֵ֨לֶק <WH2506> What portion בְּדָוִ֜יד <WH1732> [and] now David וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> not נַחֲלָ֣ה <WH5159> inheritance בְּבֶן־ <WH1121> in the son יִשַׁ֗י <WH3448> of Jesse אִ֤ישׁ <WH376> every man לְאֹהָלֶ֙יךָ֙ <WH168> to your tents יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> O Israel עַתָּ֕ה <WH6258> Now רְאֵ֥ה <WH7200> [saw בֵיתְךָ֖ <WH1004> to thine own house דָּוִ֑יד <WH1732> David וַיֵּ֥לֶךְ <WH1980> departed כָּל־ <WH3605> all יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> So all Israel לְאֹהָלָֽיו׃ <WH168> to their tents ס

וּבְנֵ֣י <WH1121> But [as for] the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel הַיֹּֽשְׁבִ֖ים <WH3427> that dwelt בְּעָרֵ֣י <WH5892> in the cities יְהוּדָ֑ה <WH3063> of Judah וַיִּמְלֹ֥ךְ <WH4427> reigned עֲלֵיהֶ֖ם <WH5921> over רְחַבְעָֽם׃ <WH7346> Rehoboam

וַיִּשְׁלַ֞ח <WH7971> sent הַמֶּ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> Then king רְחַבְעָ֗ם <WH7346> Rehoboam אֶת־ <WH853> הֲדֹרָם֙ <WH1913> Hadoram אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> who עַל־ <WH5921> was over הַמַּ֔ס <WH4522> that [was] over the tribute וַיִּרְגְּמוּ־ <WH7275> stoned ב֧וֹ בְנֵֽי־ <WH1121> and the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֛ל <WH3478> of Israel אֶ֖בֶן <WH68> him with stones וַיָּמֹ֑ת <WH4191> that he died וְהַמֶּ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> But king רְחַבְעָ֗ם <WH7346> Rehoboam הִתְאַמֵּץ֙ <WH553> made speed לַֽעֲל֣וֹת <WH5927> to get him up בַּמֶּרְכָּבָ֔ה <WH4818> to [his] chariot לָנ֖וּס <WH5127> to flee יְרוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <WH3389> to Jerusalem ס

וַיִּפְשְׁע֤וּ <WH6586> rebelled יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <WH3478> And Israel בְּבֵ֣ית <WH1004> against the house דָּוִ֔יד <WH1732> of David עַ֖ד <WH5704> against הַיּ֥וֹם <WH3117> unto this day הַזֶּֽה׃ <WH2088> to this ס
